example.eg: He was almost home when the car broke down.
example.egtrans: 车坏的时候他都快到家了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 几乎, 就快, 差不多

example.eg: There is one ticket left - we have almost sold out.  The baby is almost asleep.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 将近, 几乎就, 差不多

example.eg: I almost forgot to lock the door.
example.egtrans: 我差一点就忘记锁门了。

example.eg: The door to the cellar is almost always unlocked.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 几乎总是, 几乎总会
差点打起来，几乎动起手来

example.eg: We almost died laughing when we saw Mike's Halloween costume.
I'm almost done; give me five more minutes and I'll join you.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 快完成了, 快结束了, 马上就好了

example.eg: There used to be no chain stores in the town, but now they're almost everywhere.
I almost never eat ice cream, but I enjoy it two or three times a year.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 几乎从不, 几乎不会

example.eg: I'm almost sure I turned the stove off, but maybe we should go back to check.
